Instruction: Set the oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a casserole dish using butter or oil.
Boil the sweet potato chunks in salted water until tender. Drain, then transfer to a large bowl.

Beat the brown sugar, butter, condensed milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and salt into the mashed potatoes. Whisk the mixture until fluffy, then add the eggs and continue whisking until the mixture lightens in color. Pour the mixture into the greased casserole dish.
Bake in the oven until lightly browned and set, about 90 minutes.
